alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 29 at 5:39AM AKST until December 29 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Visibility quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...North Anchorage. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of fog is expected across of Anchorage and the Glenn Highway this morning with isolated patches of particular dense fog observed in North Anchorage. Isolated locations have observed brief dips in visibility overnight and will likely remain the case throughout this morning. Sudden drops in visibility are possible for this mornings commute.
info.instruction: A dense fog advisory means visibilities will frequently be reduced to less than one quarter mile. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
